EmailTemplate.subject: Salesforce.com Request: Grant Login Access to your System Administrator

Dear {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Please do the following as part of your training requirements by the end of the week. This will enable your system administrators to help resolve any issues you may have over the next year.
1. Please go to your name in the upper right next to the Help & Training section 2. Click on Setup 3. Click on the Personal Setup Section My Information 4. Click on Grant Login Access 5. On the Grant Access To section for Your Companyâ€™s Administrator please select the Access Duration for 1 Year 6. Click Save
